name: VETCO Clinics
description: Affordable vaccinations and basic pet health services at various locations
fullDescription: VETCO operates walk-in vaccination clinics inside Petco stores, providing convenient and affordable preventive care for dogs and cats.
whatTheyOffer:
- Affordable vaccinations
- Microchipping services
- Heartworm testing
- Flea and tick prevention
- No appointment needed
- Located inside Petco stores
howToGetIt:
1. Visit vetcoclinics.com to find a clinic near you
2. Check the schedule for your local Petco
3. Walk in during clinic hours (no appointment needed)
4. Complete a brief health form
5. Pay affordable fees at time of service
keywords: VETCO, Petco, vaccinations, microchip, heartworm test, flea, tick, walk-in, affordable, pet shots, no appointment
